name: Grass Slicer
desc: A razor sharp wind emanates from you and slices through the ground in a 15 foot wide, 30 foot long line. Creatures in the way must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 3d4 slashing damage. Creatures not in contact with the ground are unaffected. If cast for 2 AP, damage is increased to 4d4, and creatures that succeed on the saving throw take half damage.
empower: The line extends to 45 feet. Creatures that succeed on their saving throw take half damage. If cast for 2 AP, damage increased to 5d4.
author: CrusaderDroid
